content.description: Getting into the dihedral and gaining the horizontal seam under the roof is a bit tricky to figure out the beta.  Once on the head wall, the crux awaits.  Very tiny crimps on sharp rock.
content.protection: 5 bolts, lower off the last bolt that has 2 ancient biners on it.
content.location: Pulls the red roof just to the left of Hair Dog.

content.description: This route begins up slightly overhanging rock to a big roof at the second bolt.  This roof is surmounted using some interesting movement using a bad gaston in the roof and a bad pinch just above the lip before gaining the glory jugs just past the lip of the roof.  After the roof the route turns into an almost featureless vertical shield of rock.  Levitate through this section to the fourth bolt with a leaver biner which acts as the anchors for the route.  Supposedly there is an extension above this that is still a project, but I didn't see any additional bolts so I wonder if it has been removed.
content.protection: 4 bolts, the last of which has a leaver biner on it and acts as the anchor.
content.location: Fifth route from the left or 4th route from the right.

content.description: This route starts off hard with the crux found getting from the ground to just past the second bolt.  This section of the route has interesting movement over vertical rock with an assortment of crimps, sidepulls, slopey pinches and an undercling.
content.protection: 4 bolts to 1 bolt with carabiner and 1 chain anchor.
content.location: This is the second from the last route on the right side of the wall.  The route appears to be the furthest right on the wall, but look further and you will notice that there is a route even further to the right.  This route goes between two small roofs at the top of the wall and is the only route on the wall that doesn't have any kind of roof on it.
